multiplayermenu.hostserverdescription:
_MISSING_You can host a server by opening the following file through a file explorer:
Go to the game properties in steam and click 'browse local files'. Open 'colonyserver.exe' to host a server.

languagemenu.wiptext: Onder constructie. Niet alle tekst van het spel zit hierin en sommige vertalingen zijn completer dan andere.

banner.description: Kolonisten hebben een bed en 5 voedsel per dag nodig. Het rekruteren van een kolonist kost 50 voedsel.
banner.resettooltipb: Dit verwijderd al je kolonisten en gemaakte banen.
banner.resettooltipc: Het geeft je ook een nieuwe inventory en voorraad.

bannerremoval.description: Het verwijderen van de bannier geeft problemen voor de kolonie. Wat wil je doen?

tooljob.description: Selecteer het type gebied dat je wil maken.
tooljob.minerc: Plaats op de onderste laag van de wereld
tooljob.berrya: _MISSING_Quick and easy food, start with this!

toolconstruction.description: Selecteer het type gebied dat je wil maken.

areaselection.description: Kies of je het gebied wil verwijderen.

inventory.stockpiledescription: Je kan alleen dingen bouwen met de spullen in de onderste plekken. Kolonisten kunnen alleen spullen gebruiken uit de voorraad.

limits.description: Kolonisten werken tot dit limiet is behaald in de voorraad.

quickstart.closehelp: Druk op F1 om dit menu te sluiten of the heropenen

page1.text1: _MISSING_The banner is the center of your colony. Press "2" to plant it. Right-click the banner to recruit colonists.
page1.text2: _MISSING_You need food and beds to recruit colonists. Colonists need to eat to survive. Make sure there is enough food available, or they will starve!
page1.text3: _MISSING_Press "I" to craft a bed. You can only craft things with the items in the slots on the bottom. Colonists can only use items in your stockpile. They access the stockpile using crates.
page1.text4: _MISSING_Monsters will attack your colony at night! Use quivers to place archers. Press 'R' to rotate them. Press 'G' to activate a lamp.

page2.description: _MISSING_You'll need food to recruit and sustain your colonists!
page2.text1: _MISSING_Use the Commandtool (press 1) to create a berry farmer. Right-click on a block of grass, choose the right job and create an area for the farmer. Left-click to change job type.
page2.text2: _MISSING_Producing bread is a complicated but efficient method of food production. Start by making a wheat farm. After two nights your wheat will be fully grown and your farmers will harvest it.
page2.text3: _MISSING_After that, youâ€™ll need to recruit two new people by placing a grindstone and an oven. The grindstone is used to convert the wheat into flour. A baker will use the oven to bake bread.

page3.description: _MISSING_Defend your colony against the monsters of the night!
page3.text1: _MISSING_At night, monsters will try to attack your colony. Place guards, build walls and dig moats to defend your colony. Monsters cannot climb two blocks.
page3.text2: _MISSING_Do not completely isolate your colony! If there is no path towards your banner, 'Siege Mode' will activate. During Siege Mode, your stored food is quickly consumed.
page3.text3: _MISSING_The amount of monsters increases when the amount of colonists grows! Make sure your guards have enough arrows.

page4.description: _MISSING_Without arrows, monsters will slaughter your colonists!
page4.text1: _MISSING_The deepest layer of the world contains infinite ores. Right-click those ores with the Commandtool to set miners to work. Don't forget to place a crate nearby.
page4.text2: _MISSING_Place a furnace. If there is an unemployed colonist, he will automatically go to the furnace and start crafting iron ore into iron bars.
page4.text3: _MISSING_Place a workbench to turn a colonist into a crafter. He will automatically make arrows and other items for you.
